post.title: Parrot Peachy
post.description: Let the cute lovebird Peachy stand on your shoulder!
post.content:
Let the cute lovebird Peachy stand on your shoulder!

Animations

  • Shake Head Madly
  • Idle
  • Idle (Only Eye Blink)
  • MANGO

Setting up animations:

關於設定啊啊啊啊動畫的部分 pic.twitter.com/Tmqojuj7Ld

— Catlop凱拉 (@catlop0202) June 14, 2022

Things you CAN do:

  • Customize mesh color
  • Customize parameters as a model
  • Proper use through VTubeStudio (Streaming, Screenshot, etc.)

Things you CAN'T do:

  • Secondary release
  • Any other uses out of VTubeStudio without my permission
  • Claim to be the author

If there's any problem with the authorization, please contact me.
